title: Gene(s) of interest
description: This document provides information about gene(s) of interest in a particular study

Gene ID.description: The gene ID number from NCBI

Gene name.description: The full name of the gene from NCBI

Number of Transcripts.description: The number of transcripts the gene has

Gene classifcation.description: Whether the gene is protein coding, noncoding, etc

Number of exons.description: The number of exons present in the gene
